attributes.action: Replace Heathrow Airport Runway 3 with a National High Speed Train Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than spending money getting more people in planes, lets get more people in fast trains.  If the UK had a dedicated High Speed Train service (like the French or Japanese) that stretches to all major cities we could significantly reduce UK domestic flights and remove people from cars.  Money better spent!
